reviews: I read lots of reviews, most were wrong, I just got a pair 32x34 and they are so small, will give them to my neighbor, need to order, good quality but small fit! UDATED ---- Received 33x34, fits amazing so comfortable. (They sent me 3 pairs by error, all fit differently, but one was perfect. I sent back the other one back, got a thank you from amazon for honesty)
product_name: Goodthreads Men's Slim-Fit Vintage Cargo Pant

reviews: Great style, and comfortable, but they're too short, I wear a size 31, so the waist is fine, and length I go with 30 normally, and the pants fall right at the ankle when standing, but these in the length department are way too short, almost give the appeal of cropped pants and for my needs its a let down, but still 3 stars because they are comfortable.
